exemplars.name: Tristan Harris
exemplars.track_record: Co-founder of Center for Humane Technology; former Design Ethicist at Google; featured in Netflix documentary 'The Social Dilemma'; leading voice on tech ethics
exemplars.constraints: Challenged powerful tech companies from within and outside; faced resistance to ethical concerns; worked to raise awareness about attention economy and algorithmic manipulation
notable_actions: Created 'Time Well Spent' movement to challenge attention-based business models
Testified before Congress about social media's impact on democracy and mental health
Developed framework for 'Humane Technology' that prioritizes human wellbeing over engagement
Exposed how algorithms exploit psychological vulnerabilities for profit
Advocated for regulatory oversight and ethical design principles in technology

exemplars.name: Timnit Gebru
exemplars.track_record: Former co-lead of Google's Ethical AI team; pioneer in algorithmic bias research; founder of Black in AI; advocate for ethical AI development
exemplars.constraints: Faced corporate pushback on ethical research; challenged tech industry on bias and fairness; worked to ensure AI systems don't perpetuate harm
notable_actions: Published groundbreaking research on bias in facial recognition systems
Co-authored paper on risks of large language models that led to her departure from Google
Advocated for diverse perspectives in AI research and development
Built Black in AI community to support underrepresented researchers
Called for ethical review processes and transparency in AI development

exemplars.name: Joy Buolamwini
exemplars.track_record: Founder of Algorithmic Justice League; MIT Media Lab researcher; author of 'Unmasking AI'; leading voice on algorithmic bias and facial recognition ethics
exemplars.constraints: Challenged major tech companies on biased AI systems; faced technical and institutional barriers; worked to make AI systems more equitable
notable_actions: Documented racial and gender bias in commercial facial recognition systems
Created 'Gender Shades' project to audit AI systems for demographic performance
Advocated for algorithmic impact assessments and transparency requirements
Testified before Congress on the need for AI regulation and oversight
Developed frameworks for auditing and mitigating algorithmic bias
